attributes.action: nationalise all the main services in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Create national services like british gas,and bt,for the plumbing and building trade,we want people we can trust to do our jobs at a reasonable price and we want a call center and web site aswell.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
